termsModal.title: Terms and Conditions
termsModal.introText: By submitting your story to DoggoDaily, you agree to the following terms:
contentOwnershipItems: You own the rights to all content and media you submit
You grant DoggoDaily permission to publish and promote your content
You may request removal of your content at any time
contentStandardsItems: Content must be original and authentic
No offensive, inappropriate, or harmful material
reviewProcessItems: We reserve the right to edit for clarity and style
Rejection reasons will be provided if applicable
privacyDataItems: Only your chosen display name appears publicly
Media metadata may be processed for optimization
termsModal.noteText: 📋 Note: By accepting these terms, you acknowledge that your content will be reviewed and you agree to our community standards for responsible travel storytelling.

faqs.question1: What makes DoggoDaily different from other pet care facilities?
faqs.answer1: DoggoDaily offers world-class premium accommodations, 24/7 veterinary care, personalized service plans, and exclusive amenities. Our facilities feature climate-controlled suites, gourmet dining, spa services, and professional training programs - all designed to provide the ultimate experience for your beloved pet.
faqs.question2: Do you provide 24/7 emergency veterinary care?
faqs.answer2: Yes! Our Manhattan Medical Center offers 24/7 emergency veterinary services with board-certified veterinarians, advanced diagnostic equipment, and fully-equipped surgical suites. We also have on-call veterinarians at all our facilities for urgent care needs.
faqs.question3: How do I book a tour of your facilities?
faqs.answer3: You can book a premium tour through our website, by calling any of our locations, or using our live chat feature. We offer several tour options including VIP behind-the-scenes experiences, medical facility tours, and training academy visits. Tours are complimentary and include refreshments.
faqs.question4: What are your pricing and membership options?
faqs.answer4: We offer flexible pricing based on services selected, from day visits to extended stays. Our premium membership program includes exclusive perks, priority booking, discounted services, and special events. Contact us for a personalized quote based on your pet's specific needs.
faqs.question5: What should I bring when dropping off my pet?
faqs.answer5: Please bring your pet's current vaccination records, any medications, their favorite toys or blankets for comfort, and detailed feeding instructions. We provide premium bedding, toys, and gourmet meals, but personal items help your pet feel more at home.
faqs.question6: How can I stay updated on my pet during their stay?
faqs.answer6: Our VIP members receive daily photo and video updates, real-time health monitoring reports, and can schedule video calls with their pets. We also offer 24/7 access to our mobile app where you can track activities, meals, and receive instant notifications.
